America August 2010 to June 2011 Project Naviplan Replacement August 2010 to June 2011 Description The primary aim of the project is to retire the current planning product by a vendor Naviplan and integrate with a new vendor Advice America advice engine to enable modular and comprehensive financial planning for USAA wealth management It will develop a dynamic data collection tool Client Profile to collect member information and send to Advice America The Client Profile will be launched from Sales Force Responsibilities Analyzed business requirements participated in technical design development and testing of various modules assigned Responsible for Requirements capturing Preparing Software Requirements Specification Designed Use Case diagrams Class diagrams and Sequence diagrams and Object Diagrams in the detailed design phase of the project Developed the front end design using JSP Struts Developed Web services for interacting with frontend tools developed in different technologies using JAXRPC Made extensive use of Java Naming and Directory interface JNDI for looking up web services Was involved in writing JSPs JavaScript and Servlets to generate dynamic web pages and web content Worked with J2EE technologies including JSPs Servlets and IBM Web Server Used WebSphere Application Server 617 for application deployment in the clustered UNIX environment Used JavaScript for client server validation through expression language Developed webbased application using Struts Involved in code management using Star Team Involved in Production support and provided training and knowledge transfer to the user Environment Java1450 J2EEServlets JSPStrutsXML CSS HTML JavaScript IBM Web Application Server Web Services Java Developer TATA Consultancy Services November 2008 to June 2011 TATA Consultancy Services November 2008 to June 2011 Tata Consultancy Services is an IT servicebusiness solutions and outsourcing organization that delivers real results to global businessesTCS has specialized expertise across verticals including TelecomInsurance Investments CLIENT United Services Automobile AssociationUS ROLEJava Developer JavaJ2EE Developer United States Automobile Association November 2009 to August 2010 Project EAP Product Recommendation Fulfillment project November 2009 to August 2010 Description This project helps the customers in opening a suitable investment account according to his profile and prefills the recommendations of the advice given by wealth planning tools The business of the project mainly includes three steps Firstly it determines the type of account to be created for the customer based on the assets given by the member as input for the wealth planner tools Second is the part where it comes to gather all the information related to recommendations and creates an xml application which will be used to create the investment account Lastly an investment account creation process will be given to the customer with all the data prefilled Thus it helps the customer in reducing the manual efforts The challenge involved in this project is building a bridge between two independent projects wealth planning tools and the investment account creation tools This require complete knowledge of all the projects related to them need to identify where can we collect the required data and prefill all the information which was gathered Responsibilities Analyzed business requirements participated in technical design development and testing of various modules assigned Implemented the front end design using StrutsJSPServlets Implemented Web services for interacting with frontend tools developed in different technologies Used JavaScript jQuery Library for building user interface Developed Enterprise Java Beans EJB Web Services for various business transactions Involved in consuming the webservice calls through Client invocation Used Websphere Application Server 617 for application deployment in the clustered Unix environment Used Javascript for client server validation through expression language Created SQL queries Functions for the Database layer by studying the required business objects and validating them with Stored Procedures using Oracle 9i Designed and implemented the Hibernate Domain Model for the services Develop distributed applications and supporting applications using J2EE JDBC Oracle Used Star team for maintaining the component and for release and version management Environment Java1450 J2EEServlets XML XSD XSLT CSS HTML Oracle9i Sql JavaScript Websphere Application Server 617 Windows JMS JavaJ2EE Developer United States Automobile Association July 2009 to November 2009 Description The primary aim of the project is designed to benefit the customers having trust accounts This project mainly fetches the accounts of the member from the data base and checks whether the member is having trust accounts or not Based upon the presence of trust accounts it will show the trust accounts on the members accounts page Responsibilities Responsible for Requirements capturing Preparing Software Requirements Specification Designed Use Case diagrams Class diagrams and Sequence diagrams and Object Diagrams in the detailed design phase of the project Implemented MVC 2 Architecture using Jakarta Struts Framework 11 Used design patterns like Business Delegate Session Faade and Service Locator to facilitate clean distribution of roles and responsibilities across various layers of data processing Invoked Web Services for retrieving the data from the data base Developed test cases and performed unit testing using JUnit Extensively used SOAP message for service to service Communication Developed and debugged the application using RAD Created test plans and JUnit test cases and test suite for testing the application Participated in the production support and maintenance of the project Used Star Team for Version Control Used WebSphere server for deploying various components of application Environment J2EE Agile Methodology WebSphere 6160 511 RAD 67 Web Services Apache SOAP 12 JSP 20 HTML JNDI 11 JDBC 30 Servlet 23 Struts Java Developer AXA UK November 2008 to July 2009 Description This project primarly designed for those customers those who want to take a Health Insurance policy online by providing all the details Once the details submission completes it will save it as a quoteas reference number In case of nothing purchased right now but can use this quote as reference in case of purchasing policy in future instead of providing all the details again Here the added advantage is that it provides the details of all the kinds of insurance policies and their advantages so that the member can select the policy whatever he wants Responsibilities Created JSP pages to get user information such as Personal details and other details Struts Framework was used in creating the frontend application and providing proper validations using validator plugin Custom validations were written for some fields Team orchestration to effectively carry out all project activities such as analysis design coding integration and testing Tortoise SVNwas used as the Version Control Software Database Queries were handled using SQL PLUS Environment J2EE JSP 22 StrutsEclipseSQL Starteam 70 XMLTomcat HTMLJavaScript Skills Eclipse J2ee Java Hibernate Jboss CertificationsLicenses Sun Certified Java Programmer Present
